Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Horny \Horn"y\, a. [Compar. {Hornier}; superl. {Horniest}.] 1. Having horns or hornlike projections. --Gay. [1913 Webster]
2. Composed or made of horn, or of a substance resembling horn; of the nature of horn. ``The horny . . . coat of the eye.'' --Ray. [1913 Webster]
3. Hard; callous. ``His horny fist.'' --Dryden. [1913 Webster]

horny adj 1: feeling great sexual desire; "feeling horny" [syn: {aroused}, {randy}, {ruttish}, {turned on(p)}] 2: having horns or hornlike projections; "horny coral"; "horny (or horned) frog" 3: made of horn (or of a substance resembling horn) [syn: {corneous}, {hornlike}] [also: {horniest}, {hornier}]
